title: Fact-Check a Reporter's Draft
description: An editor or dedicated fact-checker must review a reporter's completed draft to verify every factual statement.

tasks.description: Read through the draft and highlight every statement of fact (e.g., names, dates, statistics, titles).
tasks.expected_outcome: All verifiable facts in the article are identified.

tasks.description: Check each highlighted fact against the reporter's provided source notes or by finding the primary source independently.
tasks.expected_outcome: Each fact is cross-referenced with a reliable source.

tasks.description: Flag any discrepancies or unverified claims and send them back to the reporter for correction.
tasks.expected_outcome: The reporter receives a clear list of facts that need to be fixed or better sourced.
